name: Awded
description: Visual overlay for deaf and hard of hearing gamers to visualize direction of audio during gameplay, for increased situational awareness.

name: Cruise Line Sale System
description: A sale system for a major cruise line which saved many man-hours a month. Added deal banners, countdown clock, terms and conditions and other things on hundreds of products for hundreds of sail dates.

name: Mega64 Archives
description: Built with Angular, a website organizing old Mega64 podcasts, aftershows, and other videos that were hard to locate.

name: This Site
description: Built with Jekyll, data is json. Freely hosted with Github. Minor edits to default theme, but it was simple and fit a resume-style site so I left it mostly as-is.

name: Breeze Blow Dry Bar
description: Built with with a heavily edited template base, since that was best for the client. Unfortunately they seem to have switched web consultants and a new, but very similar, site is up.

name: CFSI.org
description: Updated pages to maintain up to date information on events & pricing.

name: Alive STL
description: Updated pages to maintain up to date information on events.

name: US International Food
description: Updated pages to maintain up to date information on events. Edited the entire site to the Chinese version, with provided translations.

name: Johnson Development Co
description: Updated pages to maintain up to date information. Used batch editing programs to quickly create thumbnails for images on slideshow.

name: Peter Pap Oriental Rugs
description: Updated pages to maintain up to date information. Created emails.

name: StarboundServerManager
description: Early project, Node backend monitors your Starbound (a video game) server and monitors chat, location of active systems, users, and server status and displays them on an Angular frontend.

name: palette
description: Samples and averages colors in a square to generate a pallette of colors from the image. Useless, but pretty. Canvas.

name: dongz
description: A kaomoji, or "donger" generator / builder. Angular.

name: TheCrewTelemetry
description: NPM module to read telemetry data from Ubisoft's The Crew.

name: RC Plane UI
description: A UI I was contracted to create (the design insn't mine). It's made to read a csv of data from an RC plane and display altitude, speed, degrees or rotation, etc. It's currently static due to no data being fed into it.

name: My Codepen
description: Various little things I've created. Sometimes I use Codepen for quick iterations while I work, or to create css3 animations I record and make into gifs.
